item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 26, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Duolingo CEO tries to walk back AI-first comments, fails (130 points | 76 comments)
2. TeleMessage Customers Include DC Police, Andreessen Horowitz, JP Morgan,Hundreds (114 points | 12 comments)
3. A new class of materials that can passively harvest water from air (242 points | 99 comments)

6. German court sends VW execs to prison over Dieselgate scandal (468 points | 188 comments)

26. Sims, BattleBots, Cellular Automata God and Go (2001) (6 points | 1 comment)
27. Show HN: A minimalist web timer for focus and time tracking (71 points | 34 comments)
28. The truth about soft plastic recycling points at supermarkets (79 points | 85 comments)
29. Sleep apnea pill shows striking success in large clinical trial (148 points | 133 comments)
30. Jjui – A Nice TUI for Jujutsu (194 points | 38 comments)
